name: Pathways (JoffyToffy)
description:
AIE's End of Year, 2022, 48hr, Game Jam!

THEME: Areas of Game Development

Example of use - A year 12 walks up to the AIE booth at a careers event, loves games, but has no idea about development. The student plays your game, and it indicates what area of game dev they may enjoy.

- created solo -

introducing: PATHWAYS

Choose your path through the courses available at AIE. Learn about the course you want and what it takes to get into the industry.

The guide concludes with a combination of the three courses, creating an example game of what can be achieved with skills learnt at AIE.

"I hope you enjoy it" - Jacob von Appen 

-DISCLAIMER-

With such a short time frame, gameplay is minimal.

Currently the player can not die, but to continue the illusion, player movement locks the same as some NPCs during gameplay sequence.

There is a big 'to do' list in regards to polish with graphics, audio and UI.
